Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers are 10-4 on their home court.
The Cavaliers are 11-3 on the road.
The Lakers average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game this season, 1.7 fewer makes per game than the Cavaliers allow (13.5).
The Cavaliers average 8.3 more points per game (122.4) than the Lakers allow (114.1).
